name: BoX -containment-
description: Kind of the hardest game you will ever play. Help the small box "Boredox" out of a mysterious prison. Resolve head-scratching puzzles, overcome traps and sneak past the heartless opponents.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit) Processor: Intel速 Pentium速 4 2.0 GHz Memory: 75 MB RAM Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution

reviews.review_text: Enjoyable puzzle game.   However the interface is a bit confusing. It's not obvious how to load your saved (done manually) game. There is no load game option in the options menu. It is only available from the title screen.  Would be nice if the game auto-loaded your last save file too.  Thanks to the dev for responding to this.  ------------------------------------------------------------------  Previous review:  Was really enjoying this game, and then I had a break from it. All my progress was lost. The save functionality does not work. Therefore I cannot reccommend this in it's current state
